mapper.select: select sensor_name , sensor_uuid , user_id from hnt_sensor_info where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql:
select date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as getDate , concat(date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'), lpad(minute(inst_dtm), 2, '0')) as inst_dtm , round(avg(sensor_value), 1) as sensor_value from hnt_sensor_data where uuid = #{sensorUuid}
group by date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H'), minute(inst_dtm), concat(date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'), lpad(minute(inst_dtm), 2, '0')) order by getDate asc, inst_dtm asc limit 1440

select date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as getDate , concat(date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'), lpad(minute(inst_dtm), 2, '0')) as inst_dtm , round(avg(sensor_value), 1) as sensor_value from hnt_sensor_data where uuid = #{sensorUuid} and inst_dtm >= #{startDateTime} and inst_dtm <= #{endDateTime} group by date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d'), concat(date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'), lpad(minute(inst_dtm), 2, '0')) order by getDate asc, inst_dtm asc limit 1440

select date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as inst_dtm , round(avg(sensor_value), 1) as sensor_value from hnt_sensor_data where uuid = #{sensorUuid}
group by date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') order by inst_dtm asc

select date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m') as inst_dtm , round(avg(sensor_value), 1) as sensor_value from hnt_sensor_data where uuid = #{sensorUuid}
group by date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m') order by inst_dtm asc

select date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H') as inst_dtm , round(avg(sensor_value), 1) as sensor_value from hnt_sensor_data where uuid = #{sensorUuid}
group by date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H') order by inst_dtm asc

when.test: startDateTime != null and startDateTime != "" and endDateTime != null and endDateTime != ""
setDate1 != null and setDate1 != "" and setDate2 != null and setDate2 != ""

choose.when: and inst_dtm between str_to_date(#{setDate1}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') and str_to_date(#{setDate2}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
and inst_dtm between date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and now()
and inst_dtm between date_add(now(), interval -1 month) and now()
and inst_dtm between date_add(now(), interval -1 year) and now()
choose.otherwise: and inst_dtm between date_add(now(), interval -1 day) and now()

mapper.select: select date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as getDate , concat(date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'), lpad(minute(inst_dtm), 2, '0')) as inst_dtm , round(avg(sensor_value), 1) as sensor_value from hnt_sensor_data where uuid = #{sensorUuid} and inst_dtm between #{startDateTime} and #{endDateTime} group by date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d'), concat(date_format(inst_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'), lpad(minute(inst_dtm), 2, '0')) order by inst_dtm asc
